item.title: Announcement
item.description: âš ï¸ The Solution Manager (SolMan) ticketing system will be unavailable from Friday November 7 (4:00pm ET) to Wednesday November 12 (6:00am ET) for routine maintenance. Any urgent requests to Accounting Operations<mailto:DFO.AccountingOperations-Operationscomptables.MPO@DFO-MPO.GC.CA> or Financial Systems<mailto:DFO.CSUFinancialSystems-SystemeFinanciersUSC.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca> must be submitted through email. Only Solution Manager will be affected, all other systems will remain operational.
